title: Communication and teamwork during telemedicine-enabled stroke care in an ambulance
authors: Anjali Joseph, Kapil Chalil Madathil, Roxana Jafarifiroozabadi, Hunter Rogers, Sahar Mihandoust,  ...
abstract: OBJECTIVE: The purpose of this study is to understand the communication among care teams during telemedicine-enabled stroke consults in an ambulance.BACKGROUND: Telemedicine can have a significant impact on acute stroke care by enabling timely intervention in an ambulance before a patient reaches the hospital. However, limited research has been conducted on understanding and supporting team communication during the care delivery process for telemedicine-enabled stroke care in an ambulance.
